contents: Article 16 (Award Procedure) ① For government awards, the committee deliberates on organizations and people recommended by the head of the member sports organization and the head of the member city/provincial sports association, respectively, and recommends them to the requesting organization. Revised January 24, 2022. ② Sports awards are confirmed by recommendation of the committee and resolution of the board of directors for organizations and people recommended by the heads of member sports organizations, heads of member city/provincial sports associations, and heads of sports-related organizations designated by the Sports Association. , Other sports association awards can be confirmed by resolution of the committee. Revised on January 24, 2022. ③ Notwithstanding paragraphs 1 and 2, special cases may be deliberated and resolved in accordance with procedures determined by the Committee. ④ In order to recommend a person to receive an athletic award pursuant to paragraph 2, two copies of the official report in Form No. 1 (including public records in electronic document) and one copy of data proving the achievement must be submitted to the Sports Council. ⑤ When awarding awards from the Sports Council, the Sports Council must record each type of award to be awarded in the commendation ledger in Form No. 2.
